Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Temba Bavuma senses his team is on the cusp of something special at the ICC World Cup 2023
Bavuma said on Wednesday ahead of the semifinal in Kolkata, 'With the way we’ve performed as a team, it’s obviously created a lot of positive sentiments and obviously high expectation'
Bavuma did not deny a ‘normal level of anxiety’ prevailing in the Proteas dressing room but said they had the ‘solutions and mechanisms’ to deal with that
Others: Meanwhile, Australia skipper Pat Cummins said his players will draw on experience from previous title wins, spurred on by Glenn Maxwell’s heroics, which, he said, have given them ‘an extra leg’

Cummins – along with David Warner, Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, Mitchell Marsh, Mitchell Starc and Josh Hazlewood – was part of Australia’s 2015 World Cup triumph at home and their maiden T20 World Cup title win in Dubai in 2021
Rain is threatening the contest as downpours are forecast in the eastern city on Thursday and during Friday’s reserve day
